div.div: As you are aware, Governor Ducey and Superintendent Hoffman announced a statewide closure of all schools through Friday, March 27th. Thank you for your patience and support as we navigate through this difficult time.

div.p: Welcome to the Altar Valley Elementary School District website. Located twenty miles west of Tucson, Arizona, we are proud of our educational contribution to our community's students. With our outstanding teaching staff, dedicated support staff, and committed administrators, the Altar Valley School District maintains the highest standards for our students.

We hope you will use our website to learn more about our district and the excellent services we provide. Whether you are looking for student registration information, job openings, or our school calendar and events, you'll find it here. If you have questions and you don't find answers here, please contact us directly by phone or email.

div.div: At Robles Elementary, we strive for the best for both our students and staff. We hold firm in our belief that all students are capable learners, and our staff works tirelessly to provide a challenging curriculum that ensures the success of all.

At Altar Valley Middle School, we are honored to educate and offer many programs for families and students. We believe that all students can SOAR when given the opportunity, and we strive every day to make this a reality.

div.p: Governor Ducey and Superintendent Hoffman have extended school closures through the end of the school year. We will continue to provide educational opportunities and meals through the duration of the closure. We will have more information soon to answer your questions about grades, promotion, trips, etc.
We value your child’s education and have created a resource page for continued education and food service information.
